description:
""If I were the Devil"" spoke by Paul Harvey

Satan knows what he is doing, wrecking this world and people's eternal souls that is!The amount of deception in this world is mind boggling.
Satan would have you believe that he doesn't even exist or that at best he is an idea or a fairy tale. Truth is he is a real PERSON. He is the most intelligent and powerful created being. He is a fallen angel. He is the Devil.
“👉🏽 If I were the Devil"" spoke by Paul Harvey in 1965. A great monologue, It's 3 minutes that are well worth the watch.

We are the generation that gets to experience the CLIMAX of human history. All years of existence have lead up to this final chapter.
I feel sad for all the lost and decieved souls. They don't even know they are lost and decieved. They are going to be so blindsided by the tribulation. I pray that they come to know the truth and the saving knowledge of Jesus Christ. Their earthly life can end rough ... As long they have eternal life in Heaven, and are saved from an eternity in Hell.
Thank you @derekandaubriel🙏🏽
